hero.title: Building Africa's tomorrow, together
hero.subtitle: Since 2008, RAD has been supporting the industrial and economic development of the African continent with expertise, integrity and commitment.

story.title: Our story
story.content: Founded in 2008, African Development Network (RAD) was born from the vision of creating a local player capable of meeting the growing needs of the mining industry and infrastructure development in West Africa. Since our beginnings, we have evolved from a mining services company to a multisectoral group covering construction, logistics, international trade, training and technical services. Today, RAD is recognized as a trusted partner by the largest companies operating on the continent, thanks to our technical expertise, international network and commitment to excellence.
